TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreateUserWizard extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard

summary.span: 提供用于创建新网站用户帐户的用户界面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for creating new Web site user accounts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [创建用户Creating a User](#creating_a_user) - [样式和模板Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组Validation Grouping](#validation_grouping) - [使用布局模板设置格式Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件为与网站的用户数据存储进行通信的对象提供用户界面, 以便在数据存储区中创建新的用户帐户。 The control provides the user interface for the object that communicates with your Web site's user data store to create new user accounts in the data store. 依赖于创建用户并在必要时禁用它们。 The relies on the to create the user and disable them if necessary. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 登录控件, 你可能会发现在继续操作之前, 请阅读[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100))。If you are not familiar with ASP.NET login controls, you might find it helpful to read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表, 请参阅[使用成员身份管理用户](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 默认情况下, 该控件将接受来自网站访问者的用户名和密码。By default, the control will accept a user name and password from the Web site visitor. 根据站点对象的要求, 该控件可以选择接受由属性表示的电子邮件地址, 以及密码恢复确认提示问题和答案, 由和。Based on the requirements of the site's object, the control will optionally accept an email address, represented by the property, and a password recovery confirmation question and answer, represented by and . 有关显示的所有必需和可选控件的表, 请参阅。 For a table showing all required and optional controls for , see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果将设置为`true` , 并且在应用程序的 web.config 文件中设置了属性, 则可能会生成未通过正则表达式强度测试的密码。If is set to `true` and the property is set in the application's Web.config file, you could potentially generate a password that does not pass the regular expression strength test. 在这种情况下, 创建用户将引发错误, 指示密码无效。In this case, creating a user raises an error that indicates an invalid password. ## 创建用户Creating a User 当使用创建用户时, 控件将与当前交互以按顺序完成以下任务。When a user is created with the , the control interacts with the current to accomplish the following tasks in order. 1. 如果设置为`true`, 则创建密码。Create a password if is set to `true`. 2. 在数据存储区中创建表示的用户。Create the user in the data store that the represents. 3. 如果属性设置为, 则禁用存储区中的用户。`true.`Disable the user in the store if the property is set to `true.` 通过添加其他字段 , 或在和属性中提供的模板之前或之后添加其他步骤, 可以扩展控件以接受其他信息。You can extend the control to accept additional information by adding additional fields, or by adding additional steps before or after the provided templates in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 步骤是控件中的第一步, 是必需的步骤。 The step is the first step within the control, and is a required step. 默认情况下, 属性设置为`false` , 以防止用户返回到步骤, 并意外尝试使用相同的凭据创建另一个用户帐户。By default, the property is set to `false` to keep the user from returning to the step and accidentally attempting to create another user account with the same credentials. 如果设置为`false`, 则属性不会在视图状态中维护, 并且你必须在应用程序中包括逻辑以维护值。If is set to `false`, the property is not maintained in view state and you must include logic in your application to maintain the value. 文本框所表示的控件属性 (如) 在页面生命周期的所有阶段都可以访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 控件将通过文本框引发的事件选取最终用户所做的任何更改。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event raised by the text boxes. 如果已将 SMTP 邮件服务器配置为发送电子邮件, 则该控件可以选择向新用户发送电子邮件。The control can optionally send email messages to new users if you have configured an SMTP mail server to send email. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 控件使用 Internet 电子邮件服务将登录信息发送给用户。The control uses Internet email services to send login information to users. 在电子邮件中发送密码存在固有安全风险。There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in email. 你应确定你的站点是否可以接受这些安全风险。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. ## 样式和模板Styles and Templates 当控件不是用模板自定义时, 控件的属性将应用于控件中的第一个文本框和属性, 该属性将应用于控件的所有文本框。 When the control is not customized with templates, the property of the control applies to the first text box in the control and the property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control. 如果控件是用模板自定义的, 则将忽略属性和属性。 If the control is customized with templates, then the property and the property are ignored. 在这种情况下, 请直接设置每个模板子控件的属性和属性。In this case, directly set the property and the property of each template child control. 文本框 (如和) 表示的控件属性可在页面生命周期的所有阶段中访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 控件将通过文本框引发的事件选取最终用户所做的任何更改。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event raised by the text boxes. > [!NOTE] > 设置、 或属性会重新创建控件的子控件, 并在进程中丢失其控件状态。 Setting the , , or property recreates the child controls of the control, and their control state is lost in the process. 若要避免这种情况, 请显式维护控件的子控件的控件状态, 或避免将控件置于模板内。To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the control's child controls, or avoid putting controls inside of templates. 下表列出了控件样式属性, 并说明了每个样式属性影响的 UI 元素。The following table lists the control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects. 有关每种样式应用于的属性的列表, 请参阅各个样式属性的文档。For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties. |Style 属性Style property|受影响的 UI 元素UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||**继续**按钮。**Continue** button.| ||**创建用户**按钮。**Create User** button.| ||指向其他页面的链接。Links to other pages.| ||页面上告知用户如何使用控件的说明文本。Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||所有输入字段 (如文本框) 的标签。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||文本输入字段。Text entry input fields.| ||每个视图的标题文本。Title text for each view.| ||密码恢复或重置尝试成功时向用户显示的文本。Text displayed to the user when the password recovery or reset attempt is successful.| ||成员资格提供程序无法创建新用户帐户时的错误消息。Error messages when the membership provider fails to create a new user account.| ||描述密码要求的文本。The text that describes password requirements.| ||与验证关联的错误消息。Error messages associated with validation.| ## 验证分组Validation Grouping 控件使用验证组, 以便可以单独验证同一页上的其他字段。 The control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the control can be validated separately. 默认情况下, 控件的属性用作验证组的名称。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如, ID 为 "CreateUserWizard1" 的控件将使用验证组名称 "CreateUserWizard1"。For example, a control with the ID "CreateUserWizard1" will use a validation group name of "CreateUserWizard1". 如果要设置该控件所属的验证组, 则必须为该控件设置模板并更改验证组名称。If you want to set the validation group that the control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name. 请注意, 类继承自类, 该类不支持为非标准或兼容模式呈现特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer。 Note that the class inherits from the class, which does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode. 不会尝试优化非标准 Internet Explorer 模式的呈现。The does not attempt to optimize rendering for non-standard Internet Explorer mode. 若要使用控件获得最佳的 Internet Explorer 呈现功能, 请使用 XHTML 文档类型, 该类型默认情况下会在 visual Web Developer 和 visual Studio 中添加。To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio. ## 使用布局模板设置格式Formatting Using Layout Templates 控件使你可以指定控件的布局, 而无需使用 HTML `table`元素。 The control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element. 相反, 可以使用`LayoutTemplate`元素来指定布局。Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout. 在布局模板中, 创建占位符控件以指示应将项动态插入控件的位置。In the layout template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control. (这与控件的模板模型的工作方式类似。)有关更多信息，请参见 属性。(This is similar to how the template model for the control works.) For more information, see the property. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ``` ## Examples 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件的基本形式。The first code example shows how to use the control in its basic form. 此页将使用站点的默认对象创建新的网站用户帐户。This page will create a new Web site user account with the site's default object. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardBasic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardBasic/CS/createuserwizardbasiccs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardBasic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardBasic/VB/createuserwizardbasicvb.aspx#1)] 第二个代码示例演示如何将控件与默认模板一起使用。The second code example shows how to use the control with the default templates. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardFullTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardFullTemplate/CS/createuserwizardfulltemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardFullTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardFullTemplate/VB/createuserwizardfulltemplatevb.aspx#1)] 第三个代码示例将附加步骤添加到控件, 并使用事件将用户的名字和姓氏存储在个性化属性中。The third code example adds an additional step to the control and uses the event to store the user's first and last name in personalization properties. 此代码示例需要 Web.config 文件中的以下条目。The code example requires the following entries in the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatedusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/VB/createuserwizardcreateduservb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性中指定的成员资格提供程序将确定在运行时是否显示 "问题" 和 "答案" 文本框。The membership provider specified in the property will determine whether the question and answer text boxes are displayed at run time. 如果在属性中指定的成员资格提供程序需要答案, 则 "答案" 文本框将显示在控件中。If an answer is required by the membership provider specified in the property, then the answer text box will appear on the control. 控件上显示的每个文本框都有一个关联的对象。Each text box displayed on the control has a object associated with it. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例修改事件中的电子邮件, 以将用户的密码恢复确认答案添加到发送给新用户的消息中。The following code example modifies the email message in the event to include the user's password recovery confirmation answer in the message that is sent to new users. [!code-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/CS/CustomCreateUserWizard.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/VB/CustomCreateUserWizard.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示使用的`CustomCreateUserWizard`网页。The following code example demonstrates a Web page that uses the `CustomCreateUserWizard`. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/CS/createuserwizardonsendingmailcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/VB/createuserwizardonsendingmailvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以创建用户帐户, 而无需输入密码。The property makes it possible to create user accounts without entering a password for them. 例如, 当管理员创建新用户的帐户, 然后为用户提供密码时, 此功能很有用。For example, this functionality is useful when an administrator creates a new user's account and then gives a password to the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果`true`将设置为,并且在应用程序的 web.config 中设置了属性, 则不能使用创建用户。 将产生一条错误消息, 指出密码无效。You cannot create users using the if is set to `true` and the property is set in the application's Web.config. An error message indicating an invalid password will result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 字段表示创建用户帐户最后一步中的 "**继续**" 按钮的值。The field represents the value of the **Continue** button on the final step for creating a user account. 若要为控件中包含的任何控件分配 continue 功能, 请将按钮的属性设置为字段中包含的字符串。To assign continue functionality to any control contained in the control, set the property of the button to the string that is contained in the field. "**继续**" 按钮显示在用于创建用户帐户的最后一个步骤的模板上, 该用户帐户由属性表示。The **Continue** button appears on the template for the final step for creating a user account, which is represented by the property. 单击 "**继续**" 按钮会将用户重定向到属性中存储的 URL。Clicking the **Continue** button redirects the user to the URL that is stored in the property. 若要将自定义功能添加到 "**继续**" 按钮, 请为事件创建一个事件处理程序。To add custom functionality to the **Continue** button, create an event handler for the event.

summary.span: 在成员资格提供程序创建了新的网站用户帐户后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the membership provider has created the new Web site user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在属性中指定的成员资格提供程序创建新的网站用户帐户后引发。 The event is raised after the membership provider specified in the property creates the new Web site user account. 如果属性为`true`, 则用户将在事件之后登录到网站。 If the property is `true`, the user is logged on to the Web site after the event. 在用户首次登录到站点之前, 使用事件设置网站值(如个性化设置值)。Use the event to set Web site values, such as personalization values, before the user is logged on to the site for the first time. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件在个性化属性中存储用户的名字和姓氏。The following code example uses the event to store the user's first and last name in personalization properties. 此代码示例需要 Web.config 文件中的以下条目。The code example requires the following entries in the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatedusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/VB/createuserwizardcreateduservb.aspx#1)] > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件中 "**创建用户**" 按钮的外观。 The property defines the appearance of the **Create User** button in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性 (例如`CreateUserButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CreateUserButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `CreateUserButtonStyle.ForeColor`例如)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CreateUserButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性的样式设置与控件的样式设置合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在属性中应用的任何设置都将重写控件中的相应设置。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the control. 以下样式属性被设置重写:The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是, 当使用模板来定义控件的外观时 , 属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

summary.span: 获取对用户帐户创建步骤的模板的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the template for the user account creation step.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件的帐户创建步骤。 The property defines the account creation step of a control. 此属性是只读的;但是, 可以设置 返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that returns. 下表列出了在使用模板化内容时支持的必需和可选控件。The following table lists the required and optional controls that are supported when using templated content for the . |ID 或命令名称ID or command name|控件类型Control type|必需/可选Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|任何实现、包括或自定义或第三方控件的控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|必需Required| |`Password`|任何实现、包括或自定义或第三方控件的控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|如果设置为`false`, 则为必需。Required if is set to `false`.| |`Email`|任何实现、包括或自定义或第三方控件的控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|如果为, 则为必需`true.`Required if is `true.`| |`ConfirmPassword`|任何实现、包括或自定义或第三方控件的控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|无要求No requirements| |`Question`|任何实现、包括或自定义或第三方控件的控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|可选, 除非成员身份要求。Optional unless required by membership.| |`Answer`|任何实现、包括或自定义或第三方控件的控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|可选, 除非成员身份要求。Optional unless required by membership.| |`ErrorMessage`|实现的任何控件。Any control that implements .|OptionalOptional| |`CreateUser`|导致事件冒泡的任何控件Any control that causes event bubbling|OptionalOptional| |`Cancel`|任意Any|OptionalOptional| 如果将`true`属性设置为, 并且你使用的是模板化内容, 则需要控件; 如果找不到该控件或该控件的类型不正确, 则会引发异常。 If the property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the control is required; the control throws an exception if the control is not found or is of the wrong type. 如果设置为`false`, 则在找不到该控件时不会引发异常。If is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the control is not found. 如果控件的类型错误, 将忽略该控件。If the control is of the wrong type, it is ignored. 同样, 如果成员资格提供程序需要问题和答案 (由属性确定), 则和 控件是必需的, 如果找不到或类型不正确, 则会引发异常。Similarly, if a membership provider requires a question and answer (determined by the property), the and controls are required and the throws an exception if they are not found or are of the wrong type. 如果成员资格提供程序不需要这些方法, 则不会引发异常, 如果未找到, 则将不会引发异常, 并且它们将被忽略。If they are not required by the membership provider, no exception is thrown if they are not found, and if they are of the wrong type they are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否在成员资格数据存储中将新创建的用户帐户标记为已禁用。The property determines if the newly created user account will be marked as disabled in the membership data store. 将用户帐户标记为已禁用时, 不允许帐户登录到网站。When user accounts are marked as disabled, the accounts are not allowed to log on to the Web site. 例如, 如果您的网站允许新用户请求某个帐户, 但在允许访问之前需要管理审批, 则将属性设置为`true`以禁用新创建的帐户, 直到管理员批准该帐户。For example, if your Web site allows new users to request an account, but requires administrative approval before allowing access, set the property to `true` to disable newly created accounts until an administrator approves the account. 如果为`true` , 则应将`false`属性设置为, 以便不会尝试登录到新用户。 When is `true`, you should set the property to `false` so that the does not attempt to log on the new user. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证提供的电子邮件地址的正则表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided email address.

value.span: 一个字符串, 其中包含用于验证电子邮件地址的正则表达式。

span.span: A string containing the regular expression used to validate an email address.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以指定用于验证用户输入的电子邮件地址的正则表达式, 以确认它与特定模式匹配。Use the property to specify a regular expression that validates the email address entered by the user to confirm that it matches a specific pattern. 常见的用途是确保用户输入了完整的电子邮件地址, 如**user\@contoso.com**。A common use is to make sure that the user has entered a complete email address, such as **user\@contoso.com**. 正则表达式除了在属性中指定的成员资格提供程序对电子邮件地址的任何限制之外, 还使用。The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the email address by the membership provider specified in the property. 如果成员资格提供程序出于任何原因拒绝了电子邮件地址, 则将显示该属性中包含的文本。If the membership provider rejects the email address for any reason, the text contained in the property is displayed. 仅当属性设置为`true`时, 才会将地址与正则表达式进行比较。The address is only compared to the regular expression if the property is set to `true`. 如果电子邮件地址未通过正则表达式, 则会向用户显示该属性中包含的文本。If the email address does not pass the regular expression, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将正则表达式分配给属性, 以确保用户以有效格式输入其电子邮件地址, 如**用户名\@contoso.com**。The following code example assigns a regular expression to the property to make sure that the user entered their email address in a valid format, such as **username\@contoso.com**. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardEmailRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardEmailRegex/CS/createuserwizardemailregexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardEmailRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardEmailRegex/VB/createuserwizardemailregexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可更改在成员资格提供程序无法创建新用户帐户时显示的错误消息的外观。Use the property to change the appearance of error messages that are displayed when the membership provider fails to create a new user account. 默认情况下, 设置为以红色显示以下消息:By default, the is set to display the following messages in red: - - - - - - - 属性是只读的; 但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性 (例如`ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`例如)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性的样式设置与控件的样式设置合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在属性中应用的任何设置都将覆盖控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings that are applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the control. 以下样式属性被设置重写:The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是, 当使用模板来定义控件的外观时 , 属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件中标签的外观。 The property defines the appearance of labels in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性 (例如`LabelStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `LabelStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `LabelStyle.ForeColor`例如)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LabelStyle.ForeColor`). 属性定义以下属性的外观:The property defines the appearance of the following properties: - - - - - - 属性的样式设置与控件的样式设置合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在属性中应用的任何设置都将覆盖控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下样式属性被设置重写:The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是, 当使用模板来定义控件的外观时 , 属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

span.span: if the new user should be logged in after creating the user account; otherwise, .

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要创建用户帐户, `false`但在创建帐户后不对其进行身份验证, 则可以将属性设置为。The property can be set to `false` if you want to create a user account but not authenticate the account after it is created. 例如, 如果你是创建用户帐户的管理员, 或者在用户可以访问网站之前有等待时间, 则这可能会很有用。This might be useful if you are an administrator creating user accounts, for example, or if there is a waiting period before users can access the Web site. > [!NOTE] > 当属性设置为`true`时, 将在步骤结束时创建和登录用户。 When the property is set to `true`, the user will be created and logged in at the end of the step. 如果你希望在完成所有步骤后登录用户, 则可以将属性设置为`false` , 直到完成控件的所有步骤。If you want the user to be logged in after all the steps have been completed, you can set the property to `false` until all of the steps of the control are completed. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 获取一个对属性集合的引用，这些属性用于定义发送给新用户的电子邮件的特征。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the characteristics of the email message sent to new users.

value.span: 对对象的引用, 该对象定义发送给新用户的电子邮件。

span.span: A reference to a object that defines the email message sent to a new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回对一组属性的引用, 这些属性用于定义发送给新用户的电子邮件的格式和内容。The property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the email message that is sent to new users. 常见设置包括主题行和发件人的寄信人地址。Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address. 有关属性的完整列表, 请参见类。For a complete list of properties, see the class. 属性是只读的; 但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体 `Property-Subproperty`中以声明方式设置属性, `Subproperty`其中表示类的`MailDefinition-Subject`属性 (例如)。You can set the properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`). 还可以在窗体`Property.SubProperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `MailDefinition.Subject`例如)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.SubProperty` (for example, `MailDefinition.Subject`). 仅当不`null`为且不为空或`null`时, 才向新用户发送电子邮件。An email message is sent to new users only if is not `null` and if is not empty or `null`. 在这种情况下 , 会引发事件, 并尝试发送电子邮件。In that case, the event is raised and an attempt is made to send the email message. 必须将属性设置为电子邮件地址。The property must be set to an email address. 否则, 将引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown. 从对象创建电子邮件时, 它将进行下表中列出的替换。When the email message is created from the object, it will make the substitutions listed in the following table. |替换文本Substitution text|替换为Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |`<%UserName%>`|新创建的用户帐户的用户名。The user name of the newly created user account.| |`<%Password%>`|新创建的用户帐户的密码。The password for the newly created user account.| `true`如果对象的属性为,则将对邮件的内容进行HTML编码,以防邮件收件人出现跨站点脚本安全漏洞。If the property of the object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient. 您可以使用方法修改由对象创建的。You can use the method to modify the created by the object. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). > [!NOTE] > 不能保证用户接收或查看电子邮件。It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message. 若要验证用户是否已通过电子邮件收到通知, 请考虑在电子邮件中提供一个确认链接, 该链接允许用户确认是否已收到通知。To verify that a user has received a notification by email, consider providing a confirmation link in the email message that enables the user to confirm that the notification was received. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用声明性和编程语法来设置属性的属性。The following code example sets properties of the property by using both declarative and programmatic syntax. 此代码示例需要一个包含以下文本的名为 MailFile 的文本文件。This code example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text. ``` Your account was set up on our Web site with the following: Username: <%UserName%> To reset your password, you must answer the following question: Password Question: <%PasswordQuestion%> Password Answer: <%PasswordAnswer%> Thank you for creating an account with our Web site. ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/CS/createuserwizardmaildefinitioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/VB/createuserwizardmaildefinitionvb.aspx#1)]

information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例需要在 web.config 文件的部分``中定义的成员资格提供程序。The following code example requires membership providers defined in the `` section of the Web.config file. 下面是一个 web.config 文件, 用于定义小型公司中每个部门的成员资格提供程序。The following is a Web.config file that defines membership providers for each division in a small company. 在此示例中, 每个成员资格提供程序都指向 SQL Server 的数据库。For this example, each membership provider points to a SQL Server database. `` `` `` `` `` ``type="System.Web.Security.` `passwordFormat="Hashed"` `description="Stores and retrieves membership data from a Microsoft SQL Server database."` `/>` ``type="System.Web.Security.` remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击控件上的 "**继续**" 按钮时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the user clicks the **Continue** button on the control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法修改发送给新用户的电子邮件。Use the method to modify the email message sent to new users. 作为`e`参数传递的对象的属性包含将发送给新用户的对象。The property of the object passed as the `e` parameter contains the object that will be sent to the new user. 修改对象的属性以修改电子邮件。Modify the properties of the object to modify the email message. 仅当 属性指定的对象的属性指向有效的文件名时, 才会创建电子邮件。Email messages are only created when the property of the object specified by the property points to a valid file name. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了一个自定义控件, 该控件使用方法修改发送给新用户的电子邮件的文本。The following code example defines a custom control that uses the method to modify the text of the email sent to new users. 此示例需要一个包含以下文本的名为 MailFile 的文本文件。This example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text. ```csharp Your account was set up on our Web site with the following: Username: <%UserName%> To reset your password, you must answer the following question: Password Question: <%PasswordQuestion%> Password Answer: <%PasswordAnswer%> Thank you for creating an account with our Web site. ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/CS/createuserwizardonsendingmailcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/VB/createuserwizardonsendingmailvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 SMTP 邮件系统在尝试向新用户发送电子邮件时引发了异常时, 将调用方法。The method is called when the SMTP mail system raises an exception while attempting to send email to the new user. 检查作为 参数传递的对象的属性,以确定异常的实际原因。`e`Examine the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception. 最常见的问题是 web.config 文件的``部分中存在配置错误。The most common problem is a configuration error in the `` section of the Web.config file. 必须设置 作为参数传递的对象的属性, 以通知导致调用方法的异常已被处理, 否则, 将重新引发异常。 `e`You must set the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to signal that the exception that caused the method to be called has been taken care of, otherwise the exception is re-thrown. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了一个自定义对象, 该对象将电子邮件错误记录到特定于站点的日志记录函数。The following code example defines a custom object that logs email errors to a site-specific logging function. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义在控件中描述密码要求的文本的外观。 The property defines the appearance of the text that describes password requirements in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性 (例如`PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`例如)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`). 属性定义属性的外观。 The property defines the appearance of the property. 属性的样式设置与控件的样式设置合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在属性中应用的任何设置都将覆盖控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下样式属性被设置重写:The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是, 当使用模板来定义控件的外观时 , 属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用属性为用户提供有关如何创建密码的指导和要求。You can use the property to provide guidelines and requirements for the user on how to create a password. 例如, 可以将属性设置为 "密码长度必须至少为6个字符。"For example, you could set the property to "Your password must be at least six characters long." 然后, 你可以使用属性来验证用户输入的密码是否符合指导原则。You can then use the property to validate that the user entered a password that conforms to the guidelines. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证提供的密码的正则表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided password.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含用于验证提供的密码的正则表达式。

span.span: A string containing the regular expression used to validate the provided password.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可定义用于验证网站上用户的密码的要求。Use the property to define the requirements for passwords used to validate users on your Web site. 常见的用途是确保用户在密码中包含除字母之外的符号, 以使攻击者难以猜测密码。A common use is to make sure that a user has included symbols other than letters in a password to make it harder for attackers to guess a password. 正则表达式除了在属性中指定的成员资格提供程序对密码施加的任何限制之外, 还使用。The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the password by the membership provider specified in the property. 如果成员资格提供程序由于任何原因拒绝了密码, 则会显示属性中包含的文本。If the membership provider rejects the password for any reason, the text contained in the property is displayed. 如果输入的密码未通过正则表达式, 则会向用户显示该属性中包含的错误消息。If the password entered does not pass the regular expression, the error message contained in the property is displayed to the user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性定义检查密码的正则表达式, 以确保:The following code example uses the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they: - 长度超过7个字符。Are longer than seven characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊字符 (非字母数字)。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果用户输入的密码不符合这些条件, 则会向用户显示该属性中包含的文本。If the password entered by the user does not meet these criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性为`true`时, 将显示一个文本框和一个关联的标签, 用户可在其中输入电子邮件地址。 When the property is `true`, the will display a text box and an associated label for the user to enter an email address. 如果用户未输入电子邮件地址, 则该属性将显示错误消息。If the user does not enter an email address, the property will display an error message. 如果该属性设置为`true` , 并且您使用的是模板化内容 , 则该控件是必需的, 如果找不到该控件或其类型不正确, 则会引发异常。If the property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the control is required and the throws an exception if the control is not found or is of the wrong type. 如果设置为`false`, 则在找不到时, 不会引发异常。If is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the is not found. 如果它的类型错误, 将忽略它。If it is of the wrong type, it is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 如果在属性中指定的成员资格提供程序需要新用户的唯一电子邮件地址, 则必须将属性`true`设置为, 以便显示用于输入电子邮件地址的 UI。If the membership provider specified in the property requires a unique email address for new users, you must set the property to `true` so that the UI for entering an email address is displayed. 否则, 用户将看到 , 但无法输入电子邮件地址。Otherwise, the user will see the but have no way to enter an email address. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 在向用户发送用于确认帐户已创建的电子邮件前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the user is sent an email confirmation that an account has been created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性定义要发送的电子邮件时, 类将发送一封电子邮件, 确认已创建新的网站帐户。 The class will send an email message confirming that a new Web site account has been created when the property defines an email message to send. 由于电子邮件只有 "用户名" 和 "密码" 字段的自动替换字段, 因此你可以在将电子邮件发送给新用户之前, 使用事件来修改它。Because the email message only has automatic replacement fields for the user name and password fields, you can use the event to modify the email message before it is sent to the new user. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来修改发送给新用户的电子邮件。The following code example uses the event to modify the email message that is sent to new users. 此示例需要一个包含以下文本的名为 MailFile 的文本文件。This example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text. ```csharp Your account was set up on our Web site with the following: Username: <%UserName%> To reset your password, you must answer the following question: Password Question: <%PasswordQuestion%> Password Answer: <%PasswordAnswer%> Thank you for creating an account with our Web site. ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/CS/createuserwizardmaildefinitioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/VB/createuserwizardmaildefinitionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在向新用户发送电子邮件的过程中出现 SMTP 错误时发生。

span.span: Occurs when there is an SMTP error sending email to the new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 SMTP 邮件提供程序向新用户提供的电子邮件地址发送电子邮件时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when there is a problem using the SMTP mail provider to send email to the email address provided by the new user. 引发此事件的最常见原因是`` web.config 文件的节不正确。The most common reason to raise this event is when the `` section of the Web.config file is incorrect. 默认事件处理程序不会捕获或处理来自电子邮件系统的 SMTP 错误。The default event handler does not catch or handle the SMTP error from the email system. 你的 `true`事件处理程序必须将对象的属性设置为,以便阻止向网站用户显示错误。Your event handler must set the property of the object to `true` in order to stop the error from appearing to the Web site user. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件的处理程序, 该事件调用特定于站点的过程来记录电子邮件错误。The following code example is a handler for the event that calls a site-specific procedure to log the email error. 对象的属性设置为`true` , 以指示已处理错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardSendMailError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardSendMailError/CS/createuserwizardsendmailerrorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardSendMailError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardSendMailError/VB/createuserwizardsendmailerrorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它用于呈现替换文字，以通知屏幕阅读器跳过侧栏区域的内容。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定屏幕读取器读取的隐藏图像的替换文字, 该图像将提供跳过侧栏区域内容的功能。Use the property to specify the alternate text for a hidden-image read by screen readers that will provide the ability to skip the sidebar area's content. 指定的文本提供了辅助技术设备, 其中包含隐藏图像的说明, 可用于使控件更易于访问。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden image that can be used to make the control more accessible. > [!NOTE] > 如果将`false`属性设置为 (默认值), 则属性不会创建具有替换文本的隐藏图像。 If the property is set to `false` (the default), the property does not create a hidden image with alternate text. 仅 当属性为`true`时, 属性才有效。The property works only when the property is `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件中文本框控件的外观。 The property defines the appearance of text box controls in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性 (例如`TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`例如)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`). 属性定义以下文本框控件的外观:The property defines the appearance of the following text box controls: - 文本框字段 text box field - 文本框字段 text box field - 文本框字段 text box field - 文本框字段 text box field - 文本框字段 text box field 属性的样式设置与控件的样式设置合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在属性中应用的任何设置都将覆盖控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下样式属性被设置重写:The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是, 当使用模板来定义控件的外观时 , 属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.
